message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe is worth every penny of its $10,000 value to you. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece that not only meets but exceeds your expectations. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and preferences, so we can proceed with the transaction. Thank you for considering our product.
